chapters.title: Chapter 22:  To Make an Anchor Weep
chapters.info:
Caire din Gelyn Running Wave,
      p. 467—Windfinder to Pelanna.
      She is Tebreille's sister and
      Talaan's mother.  She and her sister do not get
      along well—they compete too much.  She has been much concerned
      with Talaan's disappearance.
      See also
      din Gelyn South Wind, Tebreille;
      din Gelyn, Talaan;
      Pelanna.
